hero.title: Card Issuing Platform
hero.subtitle: Launch your own white-label payment card program, fully customized to your brand, without the traditional complexities and costs.

process.title: Our Integration Process
process.subtitle: A simple, fast, and transparent launch, designed to get you to market in record time.
process.step1_desc: Together, we define your needs to create a custom card program that meets your business objectives and aligns with your market strategy.
process.step2_desc: Our technical teams integrate our platform with your systems via a robust API and customize physical and virtual cards according to your brand.
process.step3_desc: We support you during the launch of your program and provide you with the analytical tools to ensure its success and evolution.

technical.title: A Unique and Secure Card Architecture
technical.subtitle: Each card is designed with a logical structure that combines clear identification and robust security.
technical.structure_desc: Our 18-character alphanumeric format is designed to be both readable and highly secure, embedding key information directly into the number.
technical.initials_desc: The first two letters identify the cardholder, providing a quick visual check.
technical.issuer_desc: A six-digit block that identifies your institution and the product type (credit, debit, etc.).
technical.random_letters_desc: Two random letters add a layer of entropy, making card numbers harder to guess.
technical.unique_id_desc: A seven-digit sequence that ensures the uniqueness of each card within your program.
technical.luhn_desc: To ensure the integrity of each card number, we use a modified version of the Luhn algorithm. The alphanumeric sequence is first converted into a purely numeric string before the check digit is calculated.
technical.luhn_result: This process ensures that only valid card numbers can be processed, reducing data entry errors and simple fraud attempts.
